text:
[Verse]
Underneath the moon so bright
Stars are shining in the night
Dreams are floating in the air
Whisper softly if you dare

[Verse 2]
Starlight guiding all our ways
Lost in wonder never stay
Every shadow fades away
In this dream we drift and play

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams come alive
Magic in the night sky
Eyes wide open love will find
In the glow of our time

[Verse 3]
In the silence feel the beat
Heart to heart we start to meet
Every moment feels so right
Hold me closer in the night

[Bridge]
Wishes dancing in our eyes
Forever here beneath the skies
Time stands still when you are near
In this dream no need to fear

[Chorus]
Moonlit dreams come alive
Magic in the night sky
Eyes wide open love will find
In the glow of our time
title: Moonlit Dreams
